mapper.sql: id, user_id, lesson_id, work_id, score, work_dt, teacher_comment, work_file_path, work_file_name
mapper.select:
select id, sw.user_id, lesson_id, work_id, score, work_dt, teacher_comment, work_file_path, work_file_name , , u.user_name from student_work sw,tb_user u
where sw.user_id = u.user_id and sw.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into student_work (id, user_id, lesson_id, work_id, score, work_dt, teacher_comment, work_file_path, work_file_name, work_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lessonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{workId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{score,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{workDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{teacherComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.select: select count(*) from student_work where work_id = #{0};
select * from student_work where work_id = #{0} and user_id = #{1};

select id, sw.user_id, lesson_id, work_id, score, work_dt, teacher_comment, work_file_path, work_file_name,u.user_name from student_work sw,tb_user u where 1=1 and sw.user_id = u.user_id and work_id = #{workId} order by work_dt desc
